textBoxes.title: TOP-10% Talent
textBoxes.text: We value good hard- and soft-skills. On average, only 10% of candidates receive job offers from us.

textBoxes.title: Comfortable Communication
textBoxes.text: We make sure all team members possess English fluency to effectively communicate verbally and in writing, on meetings and on day-to-day basis.

textBoxes.title: Stable Availability
textBoxes.text: Our development centers are located in European timezones, ensuring comfortable overlaps with your business hours.

textBoxes.title: Unparallelled Flexibility
textBoxes.text: Hire developers of any seniority, for any duration. Scale the team up & down easily on demand.

textBoxes.title: No Administrative Overheads
textBoxes.text: We manage the HR side, including talent acquisition, replacements, compensations, training, as well a legal aspects.

textBoxes.title: Your Rights and Property are Protected
textBoxes.text: Your intellectual property will remain safe due to strict legal and security measures  (NDAs, NCAs, SLAs, and our internal security protocols)

imageBoxes.title: OneFlow Systems
imageBoxes.description: We partnered with OneFlow Systems in 2013 to help them build their printing software platform. Both teams worked hand in hand from the very beginning until the acquisition of the product by HP Inc., and beyond.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Their services were crucial during product development and contributed much to the successful closure of the deal. We won’t be able to achieve this without Codex.”

imageBoxes.title: HP Inc
imageBoxes.description: After the acquisition of OneFlow Systems’ platform, we continued to support HP Inc. in building the Siteflow platform and PrintOS infrastructure. Our specialists are also involved in other software projects and digital initiatives of the corporation.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex have provided me with a great team for more than a decade. High quality engineers and managers that understand the dynamics of my business. I look forward to our relationship continuing”
